No. 46658)} Sub:: Interest Rate Applicable for HAM Projects-Interest under clause 23.6.4- reg: This is with regard to the amended Model Concession Agreement for Hybrid Annuity Model Projects. As per the requirement of Article 23.6.4 "Interest shall be due and payable on the reducing balance of Completion Cost at an interest rate equal to the average of one year MCLR of top 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks plus 1.25%" The foot note specifies that "The Authority shall declare the list of 5 Schedule Commercial Bank on 1st September every calendar year based on the balance sheet size as declared in their annual reports,_ The year MCLR of the 5 Scheduled commercial banks shall be taken at the start of every quarter" 2  Accordingly, Authority hereby declare the Top 5 Schedule Commercial banks along with one year MCLR (Rate of Interest) applicable as on 1st January, 2023. The list of banks shall be next reviewed on 1st September 2023 and the rates shall be published for of every quarter. 3_ The rates for the 5 commercial banks are as below: Sr. No_ Bank's Name One Year MCLR in % Average Rate Applicable for the period (As on 01.01.2023) 01.01.2023 to 31.03.2023 1_ IState Bank of India 8.30 2 HDFC Bank 8.60 3 IICICI Bank 8.65 8.43 % per annum PLUS 1.25% 4 BBank of Baroda 8.30 5 IPNB 8.30 4 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. 1|0'/23 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord:) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1.
